title: Raw Data for pharmaversesdtm Package
text: Firstly, make GitHub issue {pharmaverseraw} planned updates. two main ways extend test data: either adding new datasets extending existing datasets new records/variables. Whichever method choose, worth noting following: Programs generate raw data stored data-raw/ folder. programs written standalone R script: packages need loaded given program, call library() start program (please call library(pharmaverseraw)). created program data-raw/ folder, need run standalone R script, order generate raw dataset become part pharmaverseraw package, need build package. Following best practice, dataset stored .rda file whose name consistent name dataset, e.g., dataset xx_raw stored xx_raw.rda. easiest way achieve use usethis::use_data(xx_raw) programs data-raw/ stored within pharmaverseraw GitHub repository, part pharmaverseraw package–data-raw/ folder specified .Rbuildignore. run program data-raw/ folder, generate dataset written data/ folder, become part pharmaverseraw package. names sources raw datasets specified R/*.R, purpose generating documentation man/ folder. generated raw datasets adhere structure content corresponding sdtm domain pharmaversesdtm package.

title: Adverse Events Raw Dataset — ae_raw
text: raw dataset used create pharmaversesdtm::ae

title: Adverse Events Raw Dataset — ae_raw
text: data frame 32 columns: STUDY Study Identifier PATNUM Patient Number FOLDER Folder FOLDERL Folder Label .AETERM Reported Term Adverse Event AEOUTCOME Outcome Adverse Event AELLT Lowest Level Term AELLTCD Lowest Level Term Code AEDECOD Dictionary-Derived Term AEPTCD Preferred Term Code AEHLT High Level Term AEHLTCD High Level Term Code AEHLGT High Level Group Term AEHLGTCD High Level Group Term Code AEBODSYS Body System Organ Class AEBDSYCD Body System Organ Class Code AESOC Primary System Organ Class AESOCCD Primary System Organ Class Code .AESEV Severity/Intensity .AESER Serious Event .AEREL Causality .AEACN Action Taken Study Treatment AESCAN Involves Cancer AESCNO Congenital Anomaly Birth Defect AEDIS Persist Signif Disability/Incapacity .AESDTH Results Death .AESHOSP Requires Prolongs Hospitalization .AESLIFE Life Threatening AESOD Occurred Overdose AEDTCOL Date/Time Collection .AESTDAT Start Date/Time Adverse Event .AEENDAT End Date/Time Adverse Event
